price: Mu gisagara[5] ca Swalehe rero, hari abantu b’ibigaba icenda bagenzwa n’ubwononyi kw’isi; ntibigera bakora ibitunganye namba;
arabic: وَكَانَ فِي ٱلۡمَدِينَةِ تِسۡعَةُ رَهۡطٖ يُفۡسِدُونَ فِي ٱلۡأَرۡضِ وَلَا يُصۡلِحُونَ
footnotes: [5] Ico gisagara, ubu kiri ahitwa “Al-Hijri” mu buraruko bushira uburengero bw’ikigobe c’Abarabu.

meta.transliteration: wakāna fī al-madīnati tis'ʿatu rahṭin yuf'sidūna fī al-arḍi walā yuṣ'liḥūna
